member.name: T:NuGetPe.Resources.NuGetResources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:NuGetPe.Resources.NuGetResources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:NuGetPe.Resources.NuGetResources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot create a package that has no dependencies nor content..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Dependency '{0}' has an invalid version..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{0}' already has a dependency defined for '{1}'..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Error reading '{0}'..

member.name: P:NuGetPe.Resources.NuGetResources.IncompatibleSchema
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The schema version of '{0}' is incompatible with version {1} of NuGet Package Explorer. Please upgrade NuGet Package Explorer to the latest version..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{0}' is not a valid version string..

member.name: T:NuGetPe.MachineCache
member.summary: The machine cache represents a location on the machine where packages are cached. It is a specific implementation of a local repository and can be used as such.

member.name: M:NuGetPe.MachineCache.GetCachePath
member.summary: Determines the cache path to use for NuGet.exe. By default, NuGet caches files under %LocalAppData%\NuGet\Cache. This path can be overridden by specifying a value in the NuGetCachePath environment variable.

member.name: M:NuGetPe.ManifestUtility.ReplaceTokenWithMetadata(System.String)
member.summary: Goes from $token$ to a marker value with 0.0.0+TOKENSTART.token.TOKENEND

member.name: M:NuGetPe.ManifestUtility.ReplaceMetadataWithToken(System.String)
member.summary: Goes from marker 0.0.0+TOKENSTART.token.TOKENEND to the token $token$

member.name: M:NuGetPe.UriUtility.GetPath(System.Uri)
member.summary: Converts a uri to a path. Only used for local paths.
